Title: PPILS: Protein–protein interaction prediction with language of biological coding
Method: Protein language model with light attention mechanism
Key Contributions: Encodes evolutionary features, outperforms prior models on PPI prediction tasks

Title: LPBERT: A Protein–Protein Interaction Prediction Method Based on a Pre-Trained Language Model
Key Contributions: Achieves 98–99% accuracy, high performance across multiple benchmarks

Title: ESMAraPPI: Using ESM-1b Language Model for Arabidopsis PPI Prediction
Key Contributions: Accurate plant PPI prediction, AUPR = 0.810 on unseen protein test set

Title: Deep learning models for unbiased sequence-based PPI prediction plateau at an accuracy of 0.65
Key Contributions: Performance plateau observed for sequence-only methods

Title: PIPENN-EMB: Embeddings Improve Protein Interface Prediction
Authors: David P. G. Thomas et al.
Key Contributions: Enhanced prediction of protein interface residues using PLM embeddings

Title: MINT: Learning the language of protein–protein interactions
Method: Unsupervised transformer trained on PPI corpora
Key Contributions: Captures contextual relationships between interacting proteins

Title: HO-VGAE: Higher-Order Graph Convolutional Network for PPI Link Prediction
Key Contributions: Captures higher-order connectivity in PPI networks

Title: Graph-BERT + Sequence Features for PPI Identification
Key Contributions: Node classification using hybrid sequence and graph info

Title: DNE: Discriminative Network Embedding for Pattern Discovery in PPI Networks
Key Contributions: Captures local and global structure, improves clustering

Title: SpatialPPIv2: GNN with Protein Language Model Features
Deep Learning + Feature Fusion for PPI
Authors: Fei Guo and Jianxin Wang et al.
Key Contributions: Improved accuracy and generalization across species

Title: SEHI-PPI: Sampling-Enhanced Host–Influenza PPI Prediction with Double-View Learning
Key Contributions: Motif and global feature integration, strong host–pathogen accuracy
